audio_item.dc.abstract: [Program 112] : [Side 1] : [Part 1] : [Segment 2] : Tape 2 of 2; Panel members: Roy Ashmole; Sam Sherman; Mark Levin; Prof. Knausse; Dr. J. Minzey.
